Package com.group4.Auber

Class Systems

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.group4.Auber.Systems
public class Systems
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
Create and maneges the systems that the players and operatives use. This extends Actor purely so that it can use the draw function as its called every frame.
Author:
Adam Wiegand, Robert Watts, Bogdan Bodnariu-Lescinschi

  • Constructor Details

    • Systems

      public Systems​(int x, int y, int w, int h, MapRenderer map, HUD hud, java.lang.String roomName, int healthMax)
      Create the system
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the system on the TMX map
      y - The Y coordinate of the system on the TMX map
      w - The width of the system on the TMX map
      h - The height of the the system on the TMX map
      map - the map
      hud - the headsup display
      roomName - the name of the room the system is in
      healthMax - the maximum health value

    • Systems

      public Systems​(int x, int y, MapRenderer map, HUD hud, java.lang.String roomName)
      Create a 1 by 1 system with a health value of 100.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the system on the TMX map
      y - The Y coordinate of the system on the TMX map
      map - the map
      hud - the headsup display
      roomName - the name of the room the system is in

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch, float parentAlpha)
      This is just used as it is called each frame. The systems class does not actually draw anything
      Overrides:
      draw in class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      Parameters:
      batch - The current batch from the stage
      parentAlpha - The parent alpha

    • onHit

      public void onHit​(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor by, int amount)
      The system has been attacked so decreases the health
      Parameters:
      by - the actor that attacked the system
      amount - the amount to reduce the health by
